mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, a.name, b.hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, b.contents from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no order by b.no, b.group_no desc, b.order_no asc, b.depth desc

choose.when: insert into board values (null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(group_no)+1, 1) from board b), 1, 0, #{userNo })
choose.otherwise: insert into board values (null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(group_no)+1, 1) from board b), 1, 0, #{userNo })
